page.title: 12ST MARGARETS SCH EDINBURGH
page.content: Here are some facts about my school.I am a girl in Senior 1. I am one of 103 girls in my year, one of the 558 in the Senior School and one of a total of 862. 271 are in the Primary School and 33 (some boys) in the Nursery. I am one of 742 day girls. 16 Primary girls and 104 Seniors are boarders. I am taught 14 subjects by 14 teachers. 68 teachers teach in the Senior School, 48 fulltime, 20 parttime 19 teach in the Primary and 4 in the Nursery. 24 subjects including 7 languages and 4 sciences are taught in the Senior College which was opened in 1984. Tennis and Athletics are my sports,11 are possible. 46 girls sing in the Senior 1 Choir and 40 girls study 10 different instruments. 11 play in the orchestra.
